title: Dashboard redirect after Internet Identity sign-in from selected landing CTA

requirements.summary: Ensure clicking the selected landing-page CTA triggers Internet Identity sign-in/registration as needed and then navigates to the existing hash route /dashboard.
acceptanceCriteria: When the user clicks the selected button, the Internet Identity sign-in dialog opens (if not already authenticated).
After sign-in and registration complete successfully, the app navigates to the /dashboard route.
If the user is already signed in and registered, completing the flow results in navigation to /dashboard without requiring an additional manual step.
No other buttons or elements outside the selected XPath have their behavior changed.

file_operations.description: Update ONLY the first CTA Button (the 'Get Started' button; corresponds to the selected XPath) so its onClick enforces the desired flow: if already authenticated+registered, navigate directly to /dashboard; otherwise open the existing Internet Identity sign-in/registration dialog and pass an onSuccess callback that navigates to /dashboard after completion. Use the authorization-provided Internet Identity/registration hooks already in the app to detect authenticated/registered state. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Wire HeroSection with a dashboard navigation callback (reuse the existing onNavigateToDashboard from LandingPage props) so the updated selected CTA button can navigate to the existing /dashboard hash route after successful sign-in/registration, without changing any other CTA/button behaviors.
